001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import java.lang.System.Logger;
004import java.lang.System.Logger.Level;
005import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
006import java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement;
007import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
008import java.nio.charset.Charset;
009import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
010import java.util.EnumSet;
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.Map.Entry;
014import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
015import java.util.ServiceConfigurationError;
016import java.util.ServiceLoader;
017import java.util.Set;
018import java.util.Spliterators.AbstractSpliterator;
019import java.util.function.Consumer;
020import java.util.function.Function;
021import java.util.stream.Stream;
022import java.util.stream.StreamSupport;
023
024import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.NonNull;
025import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
026
027import io.jstach.jstache.JStache;
028import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheConfig;
029import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheContentType;
030import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheContentType.UnspecifiedContentType;
031import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheFormatter;
032import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheFormatter.UnspecifiedFormatter;
033import io.jstach.jstache.JStacheName;
034import io.jstach.jstache.JStachePath;
035import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
036import io.jstach.jstachio.Template;
037import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateInfo;
038import io.jstach.jstachio.escapers.Html;
039import io.jstach.jstachio.escapers.PlainText;
040import io.jstach.jstachio.formatters.DefaultFormatter;
041import io.jstach.jstachio.formatters.SpecFormatter;
042import io.jstach.jstachio.spi.Templates.TemplateInfos.SimpleTemplateInfo;
043
044/**
045 *
046 * Locates generated templates by their model via reflection.
047 * <p>
048 * This utility class is useful if you plan on implementing your own {@link JStachio} and
049 * or other integrations.
050 *
051 * @apiNote In order to use reflection in a modular setup one must <code>open</code>
052 * packages to the {@link io.jstach.jstachio/ } module.
053 * @author agentgt
054 *
055 */
056public final class Templates {
057
058        private Templates() {
059        }
060
061        /**
062         * Finds a {@link Template} if possible otherwise falling back to a
063         * {@link TemplateInfo} based on annotation metadata. This method is effectively calls
064         * {@link #getTemplate(Class)} first and if that fails possibly tries
065         * {@link #getInfoByReflection(Class)} based on config.
066         * @apiNote Callers can do an <code>instanceof Template t</code> to see if a generated
067         * template was returned instead of the fallback.
068         * @param modelType the models class (<em>the one annotated with {@link JStache} and
069         * not the Templates class</em>)
070         * @param config config used to determine whether or not to fallback
071         * @return the template info which might be a {@link Template} if the generated
072         * template was found.
073         * @throws Exception if any reflection error happes or the template is not found
074         */
075        public static TemplateInfo findTemplate(Class<?> modelType, JStachioConfig config) throws Exception {
076                EnumSet<TemplateLoadStrategy> strategies = EnumSet.noneOf(TemplateLoadStrategy.class);
077
078                for (var s : ALL_STRATEGIES) {
079                        if (s.isEnabled(config)) {
080                                strategies.add(s);
081                        }
082                }
083                var classLoaders = collectClassLoaders(modelType.getClassLoader());
084
085                Logger logger = config.getLogger(Templates.class.getCanonicalName());
086
087                Exception error;
088                try {
089                        Template<?> r = Templates.getTemplate(modelType, strategies, classLoaders, logger);
090                        return r;
091                }
092                catch (Exception e) {
093                        error = e;
094                }
095                if (!config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.REFLECTION_TEMPLATE_DISABLE)) {
096                        if (logger.isLoggable(Level.WARNING)) {
097                                logger.log(Level.WARNING,
098                                                "Could not find generated template and will try reflection for model type: " + modelType,
099                                                error);
100                        }
101                        return getInfoByReflection(modelType);
102
103                }
104                throw error;
105
106        }
107
108        /**
109         * Finds template info by accessing JStache annotations through reflective lookup.
110         * <p>
111         * This allows you to lookup template meta data <strong>regardless of whether or not
112         * the annotation processor has generated code</strong>. This method is mainly used
113         * for fallback mechanisms and extensions.
114         * <p>
115         * Why might you need the reflective data instead of the static generated meta data?
116         * Well often times the annotation processor in a hot reload environment such as
117         * JRebel, JBoss modules, or Spring Reload has not generated the code from a JStache
118         * model and or it is not desired. This allows reflection based engines like JMustache
119         * to keep working even if code is not generated.
120         * @param modelType the class that is annotated with {@link JStache}
121         * @return template info meta data
122         * @throws Exception if any reflection error happes or the template is not found
123         */
124        public static TemplateInfo getInfoByReflection(Class<?> modelType) throws Exception {
125                return TemplateInfos.templateOf(modelType);
126        }
127
128        /**
129         * Finds a template by reflection or an exception is thrown.
130         * @param <T> the model type
131         * @param clazz the model type
132         * @return the template never <code>null</code>.
133         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the template is not found
134         * @throws Exception if the template is not found or any reflective access errors
135         */
136        public static <T> Template<T> getTemplate(Class<T> clazz) throws Exception {
137                List<ClassLoader> classLoaders = collectClassLoaders(clazz.getClassLoader());
138                return (Template<T>) getTemplate(clazz, ALL_STRATEGIES, classLoaders, JStachioConfig.noopLogger());
139        }
140
141        /**
142         * Finds a template by reflection or an exception is thrown.
143         * @param <T> the model type
144         * @param modelType the model type
145         * @param strategies load strategies
146         * @param classLoaders class loaders to try loading
147         * @param logger used to log attempted strategies. If you do not want to log use
148         * {@link JStachioConfig#noopLogger()}.
149         * @return the template never <code>null</code>.
150         * @throws NoSuchElementException if the template is not found
151         * @throws Exception if the template is not found or any reflective access errors
152         *
153         */
154        public static <T> Template<T> getTemplate(Class<T> modelType, Iterable<TemplateLoadStrategy> strategies,
155                        Iterable<ClassLoader> classLoaders, System.Logger logger) throws Exception {
156
157                for (TemplateLoadStrategy s : strategies) {
158                        if (logger.isLoggable(Level.DEBUG)) {
159                                logger.log(Level.DEBUG, "For modelType: \"" + modelType + "\" trying strategy: \"" + s + "\"");
160                        }
161                        for (ClassLoader classLoader : classLoaders) {
162                                try {
163                                        Template<T> template = s.load(modelType, classLoader, logger);
164                                        if (template != null) {
165                                                return template;
166                                        }
167                                }
168                                catch (ClassNotFoundException | TemplateNotFoundException e) {
169                                        continue;
170                                }
171                        }
172                }
173                throw new TemplateNotFoundException(modelType);
174        }
175
176        static boolean isReflectionTemplate(TemplateInfo template) {
177                if (template instanceof SimpleTemplateInfo si) {
178                        return true;
179                }
180                return false;
181        }
182
183        private static final Set<TemplateLoadStrategy> ALL_STRATEGIES = EnumSet.allOf(TemplateLoadStrategy.class);
184
185        /**
186         * Strategy to load templates dynamically.
187         *
188         * @author agentgt
189         *
190         */
191        public enum TemplateLoadStrategy {
192
193                /**
194                 * Strategy that will try the {@link ServiceLoader} with the SPI of
195                 * {@link TemplateProvider}.
196                 */
197                SERVICE_LOADER() {
198                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
199                        @Override
200                        protected <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader, System.Logger logger)
201                                        throws Exception {
202                                return (Template<T>) templateByServiceLoader(clazz, classLoader, logger);
203                        }
204
205                        @Override
206                        protected final boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config) {
207                                return !config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.SERVICELOADER_TEMPLATE_DISABLE);
208                        }
209                },
210                /**
211                 * Strategy that will try no-arg constructor
212                 */
213                CONSTRUCTOR() {
214                        @Override
215                        protected <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader, System.Logger logger)
216                                        throws Exception {
217                                return templateByConstructor(clazz, classLoader);
218                        }
219
220                        @Override
221                        protected final boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config) {
222                                return !config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.REFLECTION_TEMPLATE_DISABLE);
223                        }
224
225                };
226
227                protected abstract <T> @Nullable Template<T> load(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader, System.Logger logger)
228                                throws Exception;
229
230                protected abstract boolean isEnabled(JStachioConfig config);
231
232        }
233
234        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
235        private static <T> @Nullable Template<T> templateByConstructor(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader)
236                        throws Exception {
237                Class<?> implementation = (Class<?>) classLoader.loadClass(resolveName(clazz));
238                Constructor<?> constructor = implementation.getDeclaredConstructor();
239                constructor.setAccessible(true);
240                return (Template<T>) constructor.newInstance();
241        }
242
243        private static String resolveName(Class<?> c) {
244                var a = c.getAnnotation(JStache.class);
245                String cname;
246                if (a == null || a.name().isBlank()) {
247
248                        JStacheName name = findAnnotations(c, JStacheConfig.class).flatMap(config -> Stream.of(config.naming()))
249                                        .findFirst().orElse(null);
250
251                        String prefix = name == null ? JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED : name.prefix();
252
253                        String suffix = name == null ? JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED : name.suffix();
254
255                        prefix = prefix.equals(JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED) ? JStacheName.DEFAULT_PREFIX : prefix;
256                        suffix = suffix.equals(JStacheName.UNSPECIFIED) ? JStacheName.DEFAULT_SUFFIX : suffix;
257
258                        cname = prefix + c.getSimpleName() + suffix;
259                }
260                else {
261                        cname = a.name();
262                }
263                String packageName = c.getPackageName();
264                String fqn = packageName + (packageName.isEmpty() ? "" : ".") + cname;
265                return fqn;
266        }
267
268        private static Charset resolveCharset(Class<?> c) {
269                String charset = findAnnotations(c, JStacheConfig.class).map(config -> config.charset())
270                                .filter(cs -> !cs.isEmpty()).findFirst().orElse(null);
271                if (charset == null) {
272                        return StandardCharsets.UTF_8;
273                }
274                return Charset.forName(charset);
275        }
276
277        static <A extends Annotation> Stream<A> findAnnotations(Class<?> c, Class<A> annotationClass) {
278                var s = annotationElements(c);
279                return s.filter(p -> p != null).map(p -> p.getAnnotation(annotationClass)).filter(a -> a != null);
280        }
281
282        private static @NonNull Stream<AnnotatedElement> annotationElements(Class<?> c) {
283                Stream<? extends AnnotatedElement> enclosing = enclosing(c).flatMap(Templates::expandUsing);
284                var s = Stream.concat(enclosing, Stream.of(c.getPackage(), c.getModule()));
285                return s;
286        }
287
288        /*
289         * This is to get referenced config of JStacheConfig.using
290         */
291        private static Stream<Class<?>> expandUsing(Class<?> e) {
292
293                JStacheConfig config = e.getAnnotation(JStacheConfig.class);
294                if (config == null) {
295                        return Stream.of(e);
296                }
297                var using = config.using();
298                if (!using.equals(void.class)) {
299                        return Stream.of(e, using);
300                }
301                return Stream.of(e);
302        }
303
304        private static Stream<Class<?>> enclosing(Class<?> e) {
305                AbstractSpliterator<Class<?>> split = new AbstractSpliterator<Class<?>>(Long.MAX_VALUE, 0) {
306                        @Nullable
307                        Class<?> current = e;
308
309                        @Override
310                        public boolean tryAdvance(Consumer<? super Class<?>> action) {
311                                if (current == null) {
312                                        return false;
313                                }
314                                var c = current;
315                                current = current.getEnclosingClass();
316                                action.accept(c);
317                                return true;
318                        }
319                };
320                return StreamSupport.stream(split, false);
321        }
322
323        private static <T> @Nullable Template<?> templateByServiceLoader(Class<T> clazz, ClassLoader classLoader,
324                        System.Logger logger) {
325                ServiceLoader<TemplateProvider> loader = ServiceLoader.load(TemplateProvider.class, classLoader);
326                var it = loader.iterator();
327                while (it.hasNext()) {
328                        try {
329                                var templateProvider = it.next();
330                                for (var t : templateProvider.provideTemplates()) {
331                                        if (t.supportsType(clazz)) {
332                                                return t;
333                                        }
334                                }
335                        }
336                        catch (ServiceConfigurationError e) {
337                                logger.log(Level.ERROR, "Template provider failed to load. Skipping it.", e);
338                        }
339                }
340                return null;
341        }
342
343        private static List<ClassLoader> collectClassLoaders(@Nullable ClassLoader classLoader) {
344                return Stream.of(classLoader, Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader(), Template.class.getClassLoader())
345                                .filter(cl -> cl != null).toList();
346        }
347
348        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
349        static <E extends Throwable> void sneakyThrow(final Throwable x) throws E {
350                throw (E) x;
351        }
352
353        /**
354         * Resolve path lookup information reflectively from a model class by doing config
355         * resolution at runtime.
356         * @param model a class annotated with JStache
357         * @return the resolved path annotation
358         * @apiNote This method is an implementation detail for reflection rendering engines
359         * such as JMustache and JStachio's future reflection based engine. It is recommended
360         * you do not rely on it as it is subject to change in the future.
361         */
362        public static @Nullable JStachePath resolvePath(Class<?> model) {
363                // TODO perhaps this information should be on TemplateInfo?
364                return annotationElements(model).map(TemplateInfos::resolvePathOnElement).filter(p -> p != null).findFirst()
365                                .orElse(null);
366        }
367
368        static class TemplateInfos {
369
370                public static TemplateInfo templateOf(Class<?> model) throws Exception {
371                        JStache stache = model.getAnnotation(JStache.class);
372                        if (stache == null) {
373                                throw new IllegalArgumentException(
374                                                "Model class is not annotated with " + JStache.class.getSimpleName() + ". class: " + model);
375                        }
376                        @Nullable
377                        JStachePath pathConfig = resolvePath(model);
378                        String templateString = stache.template();
379
380                        final String templateName = resolveName(model);
381                        String path = stache.path();
382                        String templatePath;
383                        if (templateString.isEmpty() && path.isEmpty()) {
384                                String folder = model.getPackageName().replace('.', '/');
385                                folder = folder.isEmpty() ? folder : folder + "/";
386                                templatePath = folder + model.getSimpleName();
387                        }
388                        else if (!path.isEmpty()) {
389                                templatePath = path;
390                        }
391                        else {
392                                templatePath = "";
393                        }
394                        if (pathConfig != null && !templatePath.isBlank()) {
395                                templatePath = pathConfig.prefix() + templatePath + pathConfig.suffix();
396                        }
397
398                        // Class<?> templateContentType =
399                        // EscaperProvider.INSTANCE.nullToDefault(stache.contentType());
400
401                        var ee = EscaperProvider.INSTANCE.providesFromModelType(model, stache);
402                        Function<String, String> templateEscaper = ee.getValue();
403                        Class<?> templateContentType = ee.getKey();
404                        String templateMediaType = "";
405                        var jstacheContentType = templateContentType.getAnnotation(JStacheContentType.class);
406                        if (jstacheContentType != null) {
407                                templateMediaType = jstacheContentType.mediaType();
408                        }
409                        Function<@Nullable Object, String> templateFormatter = FormatterProvider.INSTANCE
410                                        .providesFromModelType(model, stache).getValue();
411
412                        Charset templateCharset = resolveCharset(model);
413
414                        long lastLoaded = System.currentTimeMillis();
415                        return new SimpleTemplateInfo( //
416                                        templateName, //
417                                        templatePath, //
418                                        templateCharset, //
419                                        templateMediaType, //
420                                        templateString, //
421                                        templateContentType, //
422                                        templateEscaper, //
423                                        templateFormatter, //
424                                        lastLoaded, //
425                                        model);
426
427                }
428
429                private static @Nullable JStachePath resolvePathOnElement(AnnotatedElement a) {
430                        var path = a.getAnnotation(JStachePath.class);
431                        if (path != null) {
432                                return path;
433                        }
434                        var config = a.getAnnotation(JStacheConfig.class);
435                        if (config != null && config.pathing().length > 0) {
436                                return config.pathing()[0];
437                        }
438                        return null;
439                }
440
441                sealed interface StaticProvider<P> {
442
443                        default @Nullable Class<?> autoToNull(@Nullable Class<?> type) {
444                                if (type == null) {
445                                        return null;
446                                }
447                                if (type.equals(autoProvider())) {
448                                        return null;
449                                }
450                                return type;
451                        }
452
453                        default Class<?> nullToDefault(@Nullable Class<?> type) {
454                                Class<?> c = autoToNull(type);
455                                if (c == null) {
456                                        return defaultProvider();
457                                }
458                                return c;
459                        }
460
461                        String providesMethod(Class<?> type);
462
463                        Class<?> autoProvider();
464
465                        Class<?> defaultProvider();
466
467                        @Nullable
468                        Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache);
469
470                        Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config);
471
472                        default Class<?> findProvider(Class<?> modelType, JStache jstache) {
473                                @Nullable
474                                Class<?> provider = autoToNull(providerFromJStache(jstache));
475                                if (provider != null) {
476                                        return provider;
477                                }
478                                provider = findAnnotations(modelType, JStacheConfig.class)
479                                                .map(config -> autoToNull(providerFromConfig(config))).filter(p -> p != null).findFirst()
480                                                .orElse(null);
481                                return nullToDefault(provider);
482                        }
483
484                        default Entry<Class<?>, P> providesFromModelType(Class<?> modelType, JStache jstache) throws Exception {
485                                var t = findProvider(modelType, jstache);
486                                return Map.entry(t, provides(t));
487                        }
488
489                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
490                        default P provides(Class<?> type) throws Exception {
491                                String provides = providesMethod(type);
492                                var method = type.getMethod(provides);
493                                Object r = method.invoke(provides);
494                                return (P) r;
495                        }
496
497                }
498
499                enum EscaperProvider implements StaticProvider<Function<String, String>> {
500
501                        INSTANCE;
502
503                        @Override
504                        public Class<?> autoProvider() {
505                                return UnspecifiedContentType.class;
506                        }
507
508                        @Override
509                        public Class<?> defaultProvider() {
510                                return Html.class;
511                        }
512
513                        @Override
514                        public @Nullable Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache) {
515                                return null;
516                        }
517
518                        @Override
519                        public Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config) {
520                                return config.contentType();
521                        }
522
523                        @Override
524                        public String providesMethod(Class<?> type) {
525                                JStacheContentType a = type.getAnnotation(JStacheContentType.class);
526                                return a.providesMethod();
527                        }
528
529                        public Function<String, String> provides(@Nullable Class<?> contentType) throws Exception {
530                                contentType = nullToDefault(contentType);
531                                if (contentType.equals(Html.class)) {
532                                        return Html.provider();
533                                }
534                                else if (contentType.equals(PlainText.class)) {
535                                        return PlainText.provider();
536                                }
537                                return StaticProvider.super.provides(contentType);
538                        }
539
540                }
541
542                enum FormatterProvider implements StaticProvider<Function<@Nullable Object, String>> {
543
544                        INSTANCE;
545
546                        @Override
547                        public Class<?> autoProvider() {
548                                return UnspecifiedFormatter.class;
549                        }
550
551                        @Override
552                        public Class<?> defaultProvider() {
553                                return DefaultFormatter.class;
554                        }
555
556                        @Override
557                        public @Nullable Class<?> providerFromJStache(JStache jstache) {
558                                return null;
559                        }
560
561                        @Override
562                        public Class<?> providerFromConfig(JStacheConfig config) {
563                                return config.formatter();
564                        }
565
566                        @Override
567                        public String providesMethod(Class<?> type) {
568                                JStacheFormatter a = type.getAnnotation(JStacheFormatter.class);
569                                return a.providesMethod();
570                        }
571
572                        public Function<@Nullable Object, String> provides(@Nullable Class<?> formatterType) throws Exception {
573                                formatterType = nullToDefault(formatterType);
574                                if (formatterType.equals(DefaultFormatter.class)) {
575                                        return DefaultFormatter.provider();
576                                }
577                                else if (formatterType.equals(SpecFormatter.class)) {
578                                        return SpecFormatter.provider();
579                                }
580                                return StaticProvider.super.provides(formatterType);
581                        }
582
583                }
584
585                record SimpleTemplateInfo( //
586                                String templateName, //
587                                String templatePath, //
588                                Charset templateCharset, //
589                                String templateMediaType, //
590                                String templateString, //
591                                Class<?> templateContentType, //
592                                Function<String, String> templateEscaper, //
593                                Function<@Nullable Object, String> templateFormatter, //
594                                long lastLoaded, //
595                                Class<?> modelClass) implements TemplateInfo {
596
597                        @Override
598                        public boolean supportsType(Class<?> type) {
599                                return modelClass().isAssignableFrom(type);
600                        }
601
602                }
603
604        }
605
606}
